mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROUND(6378.138*2*asin(sqrt(pow(sin( (lat*pi()/180-${clientLat}*pi()/180)/2),2)+cos(lat*pi()/180)*cos(${clientLat}*pi()/180)* pow(sin( (lng*pi()/180-${clientLng}*pi()/180)/2),2)))*1000) + "" AS distance FROM (SELECT m.id, m.name, m.address, m.lng, m.lat, s.pic_address, m.status FROM main_stadium m LEFT JOIN stadium_pic s ON m.id=s.stadium_id WHERE m.is_special='1' AND s.is_first='1') A ORDER BY distance ASC )B

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROUND(6378.138*2*asin(sqrt(pow(sin( (lat*pi()/180-${clientLat}*pi()/180)/2),2)+cos(lat*pi()/180)*cos(${clientLat}*pi()/180)* pow(sin( (lng*pi()/180-${clientLng}*pi()/180)/2),2)))*1000) + "" AS distance FROM (SELECT ms.id, ms.name, ms.address, s.pic_address, ms.lng, ms.lat FROM main_stadium ms LEFT JOIN stadium_pic s ON ms.id = s.stadium_id WHERE s.is_first = '1' AND CAST(lng AS DECIMAL(19, 12)) < ${maxLng} AND CAST(lng AS DECIMAL(19, 12)) > ${minLng} AND CAST(lat AS DECIMAL(19, 12)) < ${maxLat} AND CAST(lat AS DECIMAL(19, 12)) > ${minLat} ) A ORDER BY distance ASC) B LIMIT 0,${pageSize}

SELECT m.`name` AS mname, m.address, m.telephone, m.`status` AS mstatus, s.classify, s.id AS sid, s.parent_id as pid, s.`name` AS sname, s.`status` AS sstatus FROM sub_stadium s LEFT JOIN main_stadium m ON s.parent_id = m.id WHERE s.id = #{stadiumId}
SELECT pic.id,pic.pic_address,pic.is_first,pic.stadium_id,pic.create_time FROM stadium_pic pic WHERE pic.stadium_id = #{stadiumId}
SELECT ms.id, ms.name, ms.address, ms.telephone, ms.introduction, ms.status FROM main_stadium ms WHERE ms.id = #{mainStadiumId}
SELECT id, pic_address, is_first, stadium_id, create_time FROM stadium_pic WHERE stadium_pic.stadium_id = #{mainStadiumId}
